name: Number Drop: X2 Blocks Merge
description:
It is an addictive number merging puzzle game that you can enjoy without knowing time.

How To Play
- You just tap & drop the given number to the blocks.
- Merge the same numbers.
- Merge higher numbers to achieve the highest score.
- Make 2048 before the block comes down to the bottom.

FEATURES
- Addictive game play
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- No time limits.
- Smooth & simple controls.
- Game size is small.

Become the smartest person in the world!
Immerse yourself in the charm of Number Puzzle!
